panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together

targets.expr: (sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{hostname="$hostname", instance="$node",job="$job", mode!="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{hostname="$hostname", instance="$node",job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])))) * 100

panels.title: CPU Busy

targets.expr: sum(rabbitmq_queue_messages_ready * on(instance) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info{hostname="$hostname", rabbitmq_cluster="$rabbitmq_cluster", namespace="$namespace"}) by(rabbitmq_node)

sum(rabbitmq_queue_messages_unacked * on(instance) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info{hostname="$hostname", rabbitmq_cluster="$rabbitmq_cluster", namespace="$namespace"}) by(rabbitmq_node)
